file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-17-00-04 - APU DRAINS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU DRAINS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 1. General A. This procedure gives the instructions to remove and install the APU drain system. B. The outlet of the APU drain system is in the APU cowling. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU 49-17-00-000-801-A APU DRAIN SYSTEM - REMOVAL T-62T-40C11 AIRCRAFT WITH APU 49-17-00-400-801-A APU DRAIN SYSTEM - INSTALLATION T-62T-40C11 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-17-00 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-17-00-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 2. APU DRAIN SYSTEM - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the APU drain system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL SB145-49-0006 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 APU Cowling Aircraft tail cone D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Aircraft tail cone I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them: • APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-17-00 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Put the work stand below the aircraft tail cone. (4) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the lockwire (1) and loosen the clamps (2). (2) Remove the hose (3) from the APU drain system outlet (4) and from the collector tube (5). (3) Remove the bolts (6), washers (7), and the nuts (8) from the clamps (9). (4) Remove the lockwire (10) and loosen the clamps (11). (5) Remove the drain hoses (12) from the collector tube (5) (PRE-MOD SB145-49-0006). (6) Remove the drain hoses (12) from the collector tube and the air inlet hose (12) from the APU drain system outlet (4) (POST-MOD SB145-49-0006). (7) Remove the lockwire (13) and loosen the clamps (14). (8) Remove the drain hoses (12) from the drain tubes (15) thru (19). (9) Remove the bolts (20), washers (21), nuts (22), and clamps (23) from the drain tubes (15) thru (17). (10) Remove the bolts (24), washers (25), nuts (26), and clamps (27) from the drain tubes (17) and (18) and from the brackets (28). (11) Remove the drain tubes (15) thru (19). (12) Remove the unions (29) and the o-rings (30) from the drain tubes (15) and (19). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-17-00 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

O’RING 26. NUT 25. WASHER DRAIN TUBE 25. WASHER DET. E (REF.) 28. BRACKET DET. D 24. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-17-00-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 3. APU DRAIN SYSTEM - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the APU drain system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION 49-17-00 - AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION SB145-49-0006 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 APU Cowling Aircraft tail cone D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-L-23699D or MIL-L-7808K Synthetic gas turbine oil AR MS 20995C32 Lockwire AR G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) O-ring 49-17-00 2 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Aircraft tail cone EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-17-00 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. (1) Lubricate the o-rings (30) with the same oil as that used in the APU oil system and install the unions (29) and the o-rings (30) in the drain tubes (15) and (19). (2) Install the drain tubes (15) thru (19). (3) Install the clamps (27) on the drain tubes (17) and (18), and install the bolts (24), washers (25), and nuts (26) on the brackets (28). (4) Install the clamps (23) on the drain tubes (15) thru (17), and install the bolts (20), washers (21), and nuts (22). (5) Install the drain hoses (12) on the drain tubes (15) thru (19) with the clamps (14) and safety them. (6) Install the drain hoses (12) on the collector tube (5) with the clamps (11) and safety them (PRE-MOD SB145-49-0006). (7) Install the drain hoses (12) on the collector tube (5) with the clamps (11), safety them, install the drain hose (12) on the APU drain system outlet (4) with the clamp (11), and safety it (POST-MOD SB145-49-0006). (8) Install the clamps (9), bolts (6), washers (7), and nuts (8). (9) Install the hose (3) on the APU drain system outlet (4) and on the collector tube (5) with the clamps (2) and safety them. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the work stand from the work area. (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • APU FUEL SOV. (4) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-17-00 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
